/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by lush greenery, with trees and bushes adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A red truck is parked on the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
